name: The Chateau Haven
description:
DESCRIPTION
The Domaine and and its reception areas, welcome you in an exceptional setting, for a special moment, outside the boundaries of time.
A true haven of peace, the Domaine is the ideal place to design an unforgettable event in a splendid natural setting, with a focus on well-being, while combining calm and character.
As soon as you pass through the medieval gate, the main courtyard welcomes you with elegance, masterfully overlooked by the castle.
Old stones, wooded exteriors, French garden, chapel, lake, and breathtaking panorama, are all the ingredients for an exceptional estate and will provide an unforgettable experience. The stage is set: a jewel in a green and luscious setting that is waiting for you and your guests, to enjoy an enchanting stay.
SPACES AND CAPACITIES
With its room of more than 280m² including a stage and a professional kitchen area, the estate puts its unique singularity and modular spaces at your service, whether for a cocktail meal (up to 250 people), or seated (up to 180 people), indoors and outdoors.
With a capacity of 48 beds on site, you are guaranteed to take full advantage of the reception, in complete peace of mind.
Other spaces are currently being developed within the domain with exceptional accommodation capacities, which will make it possible from the start of 2022 to expand the offer to nearly 100 beds, including 30 hotel rooms. Great comfort is on offer 3 lounges of 40 to 46 m².
15 hectares of grounds remain respectful of the environment and dedicated to nature and well-being.
• 1 central location in France
• 280m² reception room with a 40m² stage
• Up to 180 people seated and 250 standing indoors
• 120m² covered space outdoors
• 1 professional catering kitchen
• PRM access
• 48 independent beds on site
• Privatized parking
• 1 pond with peninsula
• 1 chapel on the estate
Experienced and inventive, our team of event professionals will provide you with comprehensive support to make your event unique by offering you a personalized experience that will meet all your desires.
We make sure to respond to your requests, anticipate all your needs and ensure the proper follow-up of your event to make it a success.
Come and experience a special moment in the company of your guests, in the heart of a 15 hectare park located only 1h15 from Lyon. From the reception areas available to you to celebrate your union, you will enjoy a breathtaking view of the entire estate, a true haven of peace.
For your cocktail party or reception, you have access to a covered area of 120 m² on the forecourt of the Château for parties of 250 people or more, as well as the magnificent wooded park.
Located in the old stables of the Castle, the 280 m² reception room can accommodate up to 180 people seated. Its configuration with round tables will allow you to enjoy a dance floor and benefit from a 40 m² stage for the entertainment of your evening.
AT YOUR DISPOSAL
• The 15 hectare wooded park including a lake with a peninsula for photoshoots
• 1 room of 280 m² on one level, with a 40m² stage
• 1 covered outdoor space of 120 m² on the forecourt of the castle with panoramic view
• Up to 180 people seated and 250 standing indoors
• Access for people with reduced mobility
• Toilets for people with reduced mobility for men and women with changing table
• Secure parking with 90 places
• 1 chapel on the edge of the woods
• 1 professional catering kitchen with cold room , oven, glass washer, plate warmer, sink, etc.
• 18 round tables, 15 rectangular tables, 200 chairs
• Possibility to rent all the additional equipment required on site: high tables, tablecloths, glassware, tableware, tents, heated umbrellas, benches, arches, vehicles, sound system, lighting, etc.
OUR SERVICES
• Wedding-planner: to take care of all or part of your wedding, from its conceptualization to the search for service providers, to the scenography, the floral decoration and of course the logistics and coordination on D-Day and the next day.
• Caterer: Loire professionals are referenced within the domain to guarantee you choice, quality and serenity
• Entertainment: DJ, musical group, show, magician, artists, fireworks, pétanque tournament, table football, etc.
• Technical: decoration, play of light, sound system, video recording, photographer, photobox, etc.
• Transport solutions
•Communication and printing: signage, invitations, menus, seating plan, etc.
• Rental of prestige cars, horse-drawn carriages, babysitting packages, security, etc.
• Supply of wines and champagnes, culinary or oenological workshop, food-truck
• Organization of your secular ceremony within the grounds of the estate
• Hairdressing and make-up
PRICING 2022
Low Season - Saturday - Sunday from 5650€. Privatisation Friday - Sunday from 11800€
High Season - Saturday - Sunday from 7250€. Privatisation Friday - Sunday from 13800€
If you would like any more information on this venue then please do get in touch and we will be more than happy to help.
